column2: This character has recently created some war dragons.
This character is the current holder of the national treasure known as the Fire Emblem.
The ruined buildings of a long-forgotten kingdom can be found in this province.
Most soldiers at this holding have abandoned their posts.
It is extremely difficult to recruit troops in this province.
Hostile peasants are preventing the normal collection of taxes in this province.
Angry mobs are a common sight. Tensions may escalate into outright revolt.
The banners are called, but not a soul turns up.
This character is proficient in the use of long-range combat magic.
A building unlike any constructed by human hands. It is waiting... waiting for the masters who abandoned it centuries past.
These lands have been ravaged by fire. Reconstruction will take some time.
This character has the art of summoning, binding, and draining the power of dragons down to a science.
This character uses quintessence on themselves regularly, preventing their body from succumbing to the ravages of age.
This character is considering a large-scale invasion of a foreign kingdom.
